title: VERDICT WATCH! Kyle Rittenhouse Is WHY We Fight Like Hell | Guest: NJ State Sen.-elect Edward Durr
description:
Kyle Rittenhouse has the God-given right to self-defense, and we’re explaining the ins and outs of the jury deliberation. If the decision comes while we are LIVE, we’ll be ready and there to experience it WITH you. And as a special guest, we have New Jersey state Senator-elect Edward Durr! #KyleRittenhouse #RittenhouseTrial #RittenhouseVerdict
